text: so in lieu of an admin panel, considering we were going to use it for analytics, I went ahead and incorporated google analytics to the app and was able to post it online through ngrok. When you have a sec, without the React app running, confirm from any device that the link is working. <https://080c-2605-a601-af0b-f500-e109-1c05-c6aa-4338.ngrok-free.app>

text:
Hello gentlemen. I rage quit my original api branch this weekend and created the new api branch called api-base. I got a lot of work done this weekend. We can make the following get requests from my branch of our website:
• Getting a specific plant by species id
• Getting a list of species/plant data
• Getting a list of  species/plant data sorted by sunlight needs, water needs, and growth cycle respectively
• Getting a list of multiple pages at once. The api only allows us to fetch 1 page (30 plants) at once, so I wrote code for us to fetch many pages.
I'm meeting with Cory at some point tomorrow because I can't make get requests to sort the list by common name right now, which I feel like is very important. I've been starting at my computer screen all weekend and I'm about to go crazy, so I just need another set of eyes looking at this.
